title: COVID-19 precautions — Circle Community Acupuncture
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Policies MASK REQUIREMENT: surgical mask, N95, KN95, or KF94. Masks must be worn at all times by staff and patients. All masks must cover the nose, mouth and chin while fitting snugly against the sides of the face. If you have symptoms resembling COVID-19 that are new or not explained, please do NOT come to the clinic. Kaiser recommends that if your first antigen home test is negative, you should retest 24-48 hours after the first test. If you have been exposed to someone with COVID-19, you should test 5 days after exposure. If you have tested positive for COVID-19, we ask that you do not come to the clinic until at least day 11. Patients must wash their hands or use hand sanitizer after payment and before getting seated in a recliner. Talking will be minimized in the clinic in order to reduce the spread of germs. Treatment length limited to 45 minutes. We no longer offer blankets. Health screening: Read over the health screening questionnaire below prior to booking an appointment. Health Screening If you answer "yes" to any of the following questions, please do not come to the clinic for treatment and contact your primary care provider. Please contact the clinic if you need a list of no cost or low cost health care clinics in SF. Within the last 10 days, have you been diagnosed with COVID-19 or had a test confirming you have the virus? Do you have any of the following symptoms resembling COVID-19 that are new or unexplained?: fever, chills, repeated shaking or shivering, cough, sore throat, shortness of breath, difficulty breathing, feeling unusually weak or fatigued, loss of taste or smell, muscle pain, headache, runny or congested nose, diarrhea Have you noticed a new rash, lesions or skin changes? Please discuss these symptoms with a medical with a doctor to rule out Monkeypox before coming to the clinic. If you feel sick, in any way, please stay home and reschedule your appointment. If you need to cancel due to illness within 8 hours of your appointment, please let the clinic know and your cancellation fee will be waived. Get Vaccinated Circle CA is not required by San Francisco's mandate to ask for proof of vaccination from patients but we do encourage everyone who is eligible to [get vaccinated](https://sf.gov/get-vaccinated-against-covid-19). All Circle CA staff members are vaccinated. We welcome your feedback. Please contact us via phone or email with your questions and concerns. Thank you very much for following our clinic protocols throughout the pandemic, especially as things have changed. We recognize how challenging this can be and as always, we appreciate your support and understanding.
